alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 06 at 9:27AM EST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise and Calhoun. .Rainfall from last weekend and backwater from the Ohio river has caused flooding on the Green River. Water levels at Paradise will drop from moderate to minor flooding later today and then hold in minor flooding well into next week. The Green River at Calhoun will remain in minor flood stage through the weekend. For the Green River...including Paradise...moderate flooding is forecast, while at Calhoun minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 AM CST Thursday the stage was 386.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to minor flooding this evening, then continue falling through the weekend. A secondary crest is forecast Monday night at 381.2 feet. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
